entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as speaking and interacting with other characters.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A character who is gruff and experienced, with a magical eye that can move quickly.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A high-minded person mentioned as being accused of something by Moody.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: A person who wants to win and beat Dumbledore, mentioned as having a champion.

entities.name: maxime
entities.description: A person who wants to win and beat Dumbledore, mentioned as having a champion.

relationships.description: Moody accuses Dumbledore of being high-minded.
Karkaroff and Maxime are working together to beat Dumbledore.
Moody gives Harry general advice on how to get past his dragon.
